description: Lists LiveQuery results for a given run ID.
name: get_query_results

criteria.description: A JSON object of the {"key": "value"} pairs to search for.

device_id.description: A list of one or more device ids to filter on. If left blank defaults to all endpoints

device_name.description: List of device names to filter on

query.description: A query to perform as part of the results search. Supports Apache Lucene syntax

rows.description: For pagination, how many results to return at the moment, we pagination is not supported, so we will just return the first N rows

sort.description: List of dicts. key:value pairs of field to sort on, and sort direction. eg. field: SQL Response Column, order: [ASC or DESC]. Example json:  "[ "{"field": "SQL Response Column", "order": "[ASC or DESC]"}" ]"

start.description: For pagination, where to start retrieving results from

status.description: List of device statuses to filter on Values: [ matched, error, not_matched, not_supported, cancelled, unrecognized ]
